title: Bounty
content:
Bounty may refer to:

  • Bounty Hunter, a PvP minigame.
  • Bounty Hunter Shop, a store in which you can use your points obtained from playing Bounty Hunter.
  • Teleport to Target, a spell to teleport to your Bounty target.
  • Target teleport scroll, the scroll to unlock the spell above. Costs 8,000,000 points in the Bounty Hunter Shop
  • Bounty hats, hats bought with Bounty Hunter points.
  • Amulet of bounty, a silver amulet which gives a 25% chance of using one allotment seed instead of three when planting them.
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
rawContent:
'''Bounty''' may refer to:

*[[Bounty Hunter]], a [[PvP]] [[minigame]].
*[[Bounty Hunter Shop]], a store in which you can use your points obtained from playing Bounty Hunter.
*[[Teleport to Target]], a spell to teleport to your Bounty target.
*[[Target teleport scroll]], the scroll to unlock the spell above. Costs 8,000,000 points in the [[Bounty Hunter Shop]]
*[[Bounty hat]]s, hats bought with Bounty Hunter points.

*[[Amulet of bounty]], a silver amulet which gives a 25% chance of using one allotment seed instead of three when planting them.

{{disambig}}
